1.title: John the Baptist and Jesus' Ministry Begins
1.keyEvent: John baptizes Jesus; Jesus begins preaching

2.title: Healing and Forgiveness
2.keyEvent: Jesus heals paralytic and calls Levi

3.title: Jesus Heals and Chooses Disciples
3.keyEvent: Jesus heals on Sabbath; appoints twelve apostles

4.title: Parables of the Kingdom
4.keyEvent: Jesus teaches using parables about the kingdom

5.title: Miracles of Healing
5.keyEvent: Jesus heals demon-possessed man and others

6.title: Jesus Sends Out the Twelve
6.keyEvent: Disciples sent; Jesus feeds five thousand

7.title: Traditions and Teachings
7.keyEvent: Jesus teaches about purity and heals Gentile woman

8.title: Feeding Four Thousand and Peter's Confession
8.keyEvent: Jesus feeds four thousand; Peter declares Christ

9.title: Transfiguration and Teachings
9.keyEvent: Jesus transfigured; teaches about humility and service

10.title: Teachings on Divorce and Children
10.keyEvent: Jesus teaches on marriage, children, and riches

11.title: Triumphal Entry and Temple Cleansing
11.keyEvent: Jesus enters Jerusalem; cleanses the temple

12.title: Parables and Teachings
12.keyEvent: Jesus teaches parables and answers questions

13.title: Olivet Discourse
13.keyEvent: Jesus predicts destruction and end times

14.title: Last Supper and Arrest
14.keyEvent: Jesus institutes the Lord's Supper; arrested

16.title: Resurrection and Commission
16.keyEvent: Jesus rises; commissions disciples to preach
